course_description: Learn the fundamentals of programming and problem-solving using popular programming languages like Python and Java.
Master essential data structures and algorithms to become a skilled software developer.
Build and design websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a focus on modern web development practices.
Explore the principles and practices of database design, management, and optimization.
Delve into the world of AI and ML, including neural networks, deep learning, and natural language processing.
Learn about cybersecurity threats, security measures, and best practices to protect digital assets.
Study software engineering methodologies, design patterns, and project management techniques.
Explore the fundamentals of computer networking, protocols, and communication technologies.
Learn about cloud infrastructure, virtualization, and cloud services like AWS and Azure.
